version_description:
3rd party SDKs caused broken files are removed from the app.
Major update:
- downloads now have the long-awaited progress status
- files with search and sorting
- fixed browser cancel button

3rd party SDKs caused broken files are removed from the app.
Major update:
- downloads now have the long-awaited progress status
- files with search and sorting
- fixed browser cancel button

Fixed navigation bar accessibility reported by some users.
Performance improvements and new launch screen.

Complete support for latest iOS and devices, including iPhone XS Max and iPads.
Fixed passlock crash on launch related to Face ID access request to unlock app.
Fixed issues with sorting files by size.
Actions for multiple files are now supported in iOS 12.
Optimized speed for thumbnails loading and files operations.

This one is big. Hold tight!

- Complete iOS 11 and iPhone X support
- Split-view support for iPad
- Fixed bug when ad appeared on launch; developers fired!
- Multiple tabs support, favorites, bookmarks and history
- Passcode lock in the app - secure your files
- Browser custom search engines and user-agent
- Complete iCloud and Camera Roll import support
- Thumbnails for documents
- Zip archives support
- Reorder app tabs as you like
- Super stable and compatible with latest iOS, fixed 30+ crashes, 100+ bugs
- Edit text documents: 20+ syntax highlighters, full-text search
- Custom files sort order

Thank you for support!

Thank you for support!

We appreciate your feedback! Most of the issues are resolved:
- Fixed massive crash fixes and freezes related to ad networks, less ads
- Fixed bug that lead to empty UI when accessibility features enabled
- Fixed layout issues in Files tab
- Fixed files sort order
- Resume where you left off
- Text editor highligh fixes, dark mode
- Updated screenshots!

We appreciate your feedback! Most of the issues are resolved:
- Fixed massive crash fixes and freezes related to ad networks, less ads
- Fixed bug that lead to empty UI when accessibility features enabled
- Fixed layout issues in Files tab
- Fixed files sort order
- Resume where you left off
- Text editor highligh fixes, dark mode
- Updated screenshots!

- Fixed bugs that lead to app freeze after home screen
- Massive reduce of app launch time, less ads and crashes related to ad networks
- Fixed compliance issues in iOS 11.2.5

- Fixed compliance issues in iOS 11.2.5
Massive performance optimizations and bugfixes that has been crashing app for years. Enhanced text editor dark mode.
